snippet.title: SPOLOUS Introduction
snippet.description:
SPOLOUS紹介ビデオ英語バージョンです。

Will be released 23 December 2020 on itch.io.

This is a game type of Shump.
There are 3 route. If you complete a route, a new difficulty route unlocked. 3 crass difficulty are prepared.You can select 3 type fighter at first, you will able to select more fighters by piling up and paying credits.
